reviews.review: 十几年前的游戏，但是玩起来还是那么好玩。这关卡设计，一个字，绝。
Quase 14 anos...

Reading through the reviews, I can tell I beat this game pretty quickly, which is a shame, because it's such a smart game. For 10 dollars, this game is fairly short, but those 2-4 hours you spend on its 19 chambers are fantastic. The puzzles are well thought out, the [spoiler]fight with GLaDOS at the end[/spoiler] is fun and clever, and the mere concept of a portal gun opens up so many opportunities. In addition, the game being short allows you to replay it, trying to beat your previous time. 

I have yet to play the optional challenges, and will update this review with my opinions on them once I do.

What can I say. This game is a classic. 

In the words of GLaDOS:

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
"HUGE SUCCESS!!"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction.
A childhood favorite. Despite being somewhat short, this is a great game that has survived the test of time. Good puzzles, interesting story, and innovative gameplay. Iconic.

Купил на летней распродаже Стим 2021 по 80% скидке. Прикольная игрушка от любимой компании, так ещё и на старом добром движке. Есть над чем подумать. Задумка с портальной пушкой вообще огонь. Основную сюжетку прошёл за 3 часа. Благо есть дополнительные уровни которые продлят зависание в игре ещё на 5-6 часиков, но брать без скидки или с маленькой скидкой не советую. 
Ставлю игре 8/10.
Объяснять нет смысла, всё ровно никто не будет читать мой отзыв.

在游戏里一个管道的场景 可以蹲着往左还可以往右 我想往左边走来着但是手滑往右边去了

我想 “WTF！我不是已经走出试验区了吗 她还能监视’我‘？？？”
通关之后 《still alive》响起 最后回到菜单界面摆着一个蛋糕，但她说过会在把“我”丢进焚化炉之后给“我”一个蛋糕
我就想 会不会死的其实还是“我”，这一切都是她的实验的一部分

[b]Summary:[/b]
This is an good game. [i]Portal[/i] is a well-loved classic, known for its puzzles and comedic writing. Overall, this is a well-designed and influential game.

[b]My Experience:[/b]
[i]Portal[/i], and particularly its sequel, [i]Portal 2[/i], have made themselves into classics with their clever puzzles and excellent writing. As the name implies, the game revolves around the portal device, which can be used to create portals for instant travel between two points. This mechanic is the core of the game, and Valve uses it to create a wonderful set of puzzles. Perhaps the best part of this game is its humor, which is arguably some of the best in all of video gaming. There are flaws with [i]Portal[/i], for sure, both in level design and programming; however, it did not detract too much from an otherwise great game.

[b]My Recommendation:[/b]
[i]Portal[/i] is a good game, and I definitely recommend it. It's a well-known game, and not without merit; for those looking to enjoy the humor of GLaDOS or to solve puzzles, I think this is a good buy. As always, try and wait for a sale :).

Você pode (ou não, tudo depende de você) ganhar um bolo, só isso já é o suficiente pra qualquer um comprar esse jogo. Tipo, quem não gosta de bolo? eu gosto de bolo, meu bolo favorito é de chocolate com morango, vou deixar uma receita aqui pra quem quiser fazer. 

    2 copos de açúcar

    3 colheres de margarina

    3 ovos

    2 copos de leite

    1/2 xícara (chá) de chocolate

    3 copos de farinha de trigo

    1 colher (sopa) de fermento

    Recheio:

    1 lata de leite condensado

    1 colher de manteiga ou margarina

    1 xícara (chá) de morango picado

    Cobertura:

    1 lata de leite condensado

    1 colher de manteiga ou margarina

    3 colheres de chocolate

    Morangos para enfeitar

Modo de preparo: 

    Massa:

    Bater a margarina com o açúcar, depois acrescentar os ovos até ficar uma massa homogênea.

    Acrescentar o leite, o chocolate e, aos poucos, a a farinha de trigo e por último o fermento, misturando levemente.

    Recheio:

    Levar o leite condensado e a margarina ao fogo, até dar uma leve engrossada, apagar o fogo e acrescentar o morango.

    Cobertura:

    Levar os ingredientes ao fogo até engrossar.

    Cortar o bolo ao meio, rechear, colocar a cobertura e enfeitar com os morangos.
